name: Identity Parade {GameJam}
description:
How to play:

WASD and IJKL to perform actions
Click to select people (when Spotlight is on)

Figure out who you're playing as by narrowing down who does the actions
you control with the keyboard! Your player will animate every time if
they're yours. Good Luck!

Created for an LSBU GameJam by Frozen Goblin:

Andrew McKeown, Miles Gilbert, Harley Knowles, Ben Taylor, Andrew St Ledger, Charlie Poole and Farah Harmouzi.
